sub_title: SEO and Digital Marketer, Ceramist and Luthier Apprentice at Luthier Norberto Novik - EC/NL-based
summary:
I help companies, organizations and individuals improve the way they connect with their audience. 
I do this by creating eye-catching visual materials and providing guidance on branding and communication strategies. 

In this day and (digital) age, it has become harder than ever capture people's attention, and the array of platforms and tools to choose from can be overwhelming. My approach is focused and effective. After we've developed an engaging brand and message, we identify which marketing strategies will produce the best results, and from there we dive into content creation i.e. videos, images and graphics that best illustrate your story and impact. 

Do you want to know more? Send me a message.

My skillset includes:

• Copywriting 
• Storytelling through various mediums
• English and Spanish fluency
• Cultural sensitivity
• Digital marketing strategies
• Social media and multimedia management
• Branding and messaging
• Graphic design, photography and video production
• Website creation and management
• SEO
• Qualitative research methods
